title: Chorizo hash with peppers and paprika
description: Equipment: You will  need a heavy-based frying pan about 8 inches (20 cm) in diameter, a slightly smaller frying pan for the eggs and two plates placed in a warming oven.
ingredients: 10 oz (275 g) Desirée or King Edward potatoes
1 fat clove garlic, peeled and crushed
salt and freshly milled black pepper
